modName: Age of the fallen Race pack -WIP-
summary: My first races (they are essentialy copies of bretons with different abilities and stats.
descriptionHtml:
In this pack you will find at least 2 new races, i will add more as i go along to make a whole set, i ask that if you find any bugs then you report them to me straight away and i will have a look imediatly, i give permision for someone to remake this pack as they see fit especialy if they can do it better.

Races so far ( one may not appear for some reason)

Fire Breton:

This race swings closer to a warrior/mage mix and provides resistance to fire damage but weakening to ice, you can summon flame atronachs to aid you.   Model = Breton + Flame atronach trail fx.

Frost breton:

This race swings closer to a pure mage and provides resistance to ice damage but weakening to fire damage, you can summon some frost thralls to help you or even use a frozen/paralysing breath like power. Model = Breton + frost atronach fx

Storm Breton:

This race swings towards archer/thief/mage mix and at this time i cant quite say its powers other than it has a 25% lighting resistance and no weekness as of yet.

model= Breton + storm atronach fx.
author: jnorman
